Alright i'll try to get your march package seeing as its probably easier. I installed the driver for his exact toshiba model on a flash drive and installed it on his computer and no cigar. I rebooted and still nothing.

Great download! Everything worked on the first go. The only trouble I had was finding the drivers again, and they keyboard "@" mixed up with the """ although a quick online search gave me the solution. And just a head up for those using the US keyboard, the only thing that fixed the keyboard issue was to delete the UK option in "Regional and Language" under the Language tab in the Advanced menu. And leave only the US language option. Thanks Liluser, you are the man!
